scripts.dev: concurrently -n "rev-api,reva-candidate,reva-admin-react,reva-website" -c "blue,green,cyan,magenta" -k "npm run dev -w reva-api" "npm run dev --prefix packages/reva-candidate" "npm run dev --prefix packages/reva-admin-react" "npm run dev --prefix packages/reva-website"
scripts.front-apps: concurrently -n "reva-candidate,reva-admin-react,reva-website" -c "green,cyan,magenta" -k "npm run dev --prefix packages/reva-candidate" "npm run dev --prefix packages/reva-admin-react" "npm run dev --prefix packages/reva-website"
scripts.graphql:generate: npm run graphql:generate --workspace=reva-api && npm run graphql:generate --prefix packages/reva-admin-react && npm run graphql:generate --prefix packages/reva-candidate
